original_text: Do not entertain an accusation against an elder unless it is brought by two or three witnesses.
korean_text: 장로에 대한 고발은 두세 증인이 없으면 받지 말 것이요

sentences.original_text: Do not entertain an accusation against an elder
unless it is brought by two or three witnesses
sentences.korean_translation: 두세 명의 증인이 있는 경우를 제외하고
